tools.name: remarkable_browse
tools.description: Browse your reMarkable tablet library. List folders and documents at a given path, or search for documents by name. Use path='/' for root folder. Use query parameter to search across all documents.

path.description: Folder path to browse (default: '/' for root). Example: '/Work' or '/Personal/Notes'

query.description: Search term to find documents by name (optional, triggers search mode)

tools.name: remarkable_read
tools.description: Read and extract text content from a reMarkable document. Supports PDFs, EPUBs, and notebooks. Use pagination for large documents. Can filter content with grep pattern.

document.description: Document name or path. Use remarkable_browse to find documents first.

page.description: Page number (default: 1). Check 'more' field in response for additional pages.

grep.description: Regex pattern to filter content on current page

include_ocr.description: Enable OCR for handwritten content (default: false)

tools.name: remarkable_search
tools.description: Search across multiple reMarkable documents and return matching content. More powerful than remarkable_browse query - searches inside document content.

grep.description: Pattern to search within document content

include_ocr.description: Enable OCR for handwritten content (default: false)

tools.name: remarkable_recent
tools.description: Get recently modified documents from your reMarkable tablet. Useful for finding what you were working on recently.

limit.description: Maximum documents to return (default: 10, max: 50 without preview, 10 with preview)

include_preview.description: Include first ~200 chars of text content (default: false)

tools.name: remarkable_status
tools.description: Check connection status and authentication with reMarkable Cloud. Use this to verify your connection or troubleshoot issues.

tools.name: remarkable_image
tools.description: Render a reMarkable notebook page as an image (PNG or SVG). Essential for viewing handwritten notes, sketches, diagrams, and drawings. Optionally extract text via OCR.

document.description: Document name or path. Use remarkable_browse to find notebooks.

output_format.description: Output format: 'png' (default) or 'svg' for vector graphics

background.description: Background color as hex code (default: '#FBFBFB'). Use '#00000000' for transparent.

include_ocr.description: Enable OCR text extraction from the image (default: false). Requires Google Vision API key.
